text: usake baad saaleh unase tal gae aur (unase mukhaatib hokar) kaha meree qaum (aah) mainen to apane paravaradigaar ke paigaam tum tak pahucha die the aur tumhaare khairakhvaahee kee thee (aur oonch neech samajha diya tha) magar aphasos tum (khairakhvaah) samajhaane vaalon ko apana dost hee nahin samajhate
